00011 // This is codes for addtional information.
00012 //
00013 #define CODA                    0x00000001
00014 
00015 // prefix 'IR' means "Irregular" or "불규칙" in Korean
00016 #define IR_SIOT                 0x00000002
00017 #define IR_DIGT                 0x00000004
00018 #define IR_BIUP                 0x00000008
00019 #define IR_RUH                  0x00000010
00020 #define IR_YUR                  0x00000020
00021 #define IR_RUR                  0x00000040
00022 #define IR_GURRA                0x00000080
00023 #define IR_HIUNG1               0x00000100
00024 #define IR_HIUNG2               0x00000200
00025 #define IR_UR                   0x00000400
00026 
00027 // 탈락
00028 // prefix 'EL' means "Elision" or "탈락" in Korean
00029 #define EL_UH                   0x00000800
00030 #define EL_hlL                  0x00001000
00031 #define EL_OO                   0x00002000
00032 #define EL_HOMOPHONE    0x00004000
00033 #define EL_UR                   0x00008000
00034 
00035 // 축약
00036 // prefix 'CT' means "contraction" or "축약" in Korean
00037 #define CT_WAHWOH               0x00010000
00038 #define CT_WAE                  0x00020000
00039 #define CT_YUR                  0x00040000
00040 #define CT_WEH                  0x00080000
00041 #define CT_UI                   0x00100000
00042 #define CT_AE                   0x00200000
00043 #define CT_CHEE                 0x00400000
00044 #define CT_KEH                  0x00800000
00045 
00046 // 기타
00047 // prefix 'ET' means "ETC"
00048 #define ET_SEO                  0x01000000
00049 #define ET_YAH                  0x02000000
00050 #define EX_NUCLEUS              0x04000000
00051 #define ET_YOH                  0x08000000
00052 //
00053 // end of additional information.
00054 //
